messages.content: Dear Voter, Thank you for taking the trouble to vote by post. I am writing, in case you have not yet received my election message through the Royal Mail, to ask you to consider voting for me, Mary Varrall, in this General Election.

messages.title: We offer to build a fairer Britain â€“ fair taxes, lifting the poorest out of taxation, fair opportunities for children, a fair future with green jobs through investment in public transport, renewable energy and efficient homes, not least we offer a fair deal for you by making politicians accountable

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lifting the poorest out of taxation.
A fair future with green jobs through investment in public transport, renewable energy and efficient homes.
Making politicians accountable to offer a fair deal for voters.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Everyone agrees we need a change. We have had a Labour government for 13 years. Here in Bexhill and Battle we have had a Conservative MP, it seems, forever. You will only get change with the Liberal Democrats.

issues.environment: Investment in public transport, renewable energy and efficient homes.
issues.socialWelfare: Lifting the poorest out of taxation.
